text: Neukirem Rasul uleh Hadharat d Bandum saban that geuba peurintah Peugalak bandum mukmin nyang taʻat Meuteumeung nikmat dudoe bak Allah Neuyue peutakot kaphe nyang sisat Dudoe meularat azeub that leupah Awak nyang kaphe bandum sit batat Rasul Hadharat bandum jibantah Di jih nyang bateu nyang galak jih that ‘Oh geukheun ayat jikheun beurakah ‘Oh geupeutakot azeub Hadharat Jipeukhem ligat ulok sileupah
